_header: King be thou ready watch and wake
_description: Death besieges the castle of the soul — three couplets in a Middle English sermon

BLHar2247.First Lines:
Kyng, be þu redy, wach and wakeOr þu be ware I woll
                    þe take…
BLHar2247.Last Lines:
…O þu kyng a-slake þi bostefor death is ny to take
                    þi goste
